CustomField.description: # of days between creation of onboarding object and meet & greet completed
CustomField.formula:
If(ISNULL(TAA_M_G_Actual_Call__c),
(today() - (TAA_M_G_Review_Due__c) - 2*( floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor(((TAA_M_G_Review_Due__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))),
(datevalue(TAA_M_G_Actual_Call__c) - (TAA_M_G_Review_Due__c) - 2*( floor((datevalue(TAA_M_G_Actual_Call__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor(((TAA_M_G_Review_Due__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Reflects # of days between the creation date of onboarding object and the M&G completed date.
CustomField.label: #Days M & G
